creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: Full blue fabric; blind-stamped design (back); gold-stamped lettering and designs; endpapers: grey wove with printed designs in dark grey; 178 pp. (excluding illustrations)
medium: Reproductions of pen and ink drawings
title: Some British Ballads
